additional_requirement: focus on the ethical dilemma and its implications in real-world scenarios
discuss ethical and safety concerns in autonomous vehicle development
analyze the causes and the impact on local and global policy
explore the ethical and societal implications of the policies
discuss the ethical concerns and implications for privacy
analyze the impact on public opinion and election outcomes
address ethical concerns and implications for misinformation
evaluate the methods and ethical implications of modern political warfare
discuss the evolution and impact of propaganda techniques through history
examine the socio-economic impacts and ethical concerns
